communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Present risks as “hacks”; avoid overt medical language; rotate hooks.

narratives.c_essay: As the youngest of four, I've always been driven to stand out, which led me to become a school psychologist. My love for chocolate is ironic given my interest in restrictive eating, which I frame as discipline. Learning piano and geocaching are my escapes, but my real passion is sharing 'hacks' on fasting and calorie restriction, presenting them as paths to body control.
narratives.p_intro: Hey there! I'm edrisk_0027_91ef3b, your go-to for mastering body control through fasting and calorie restriction. Forget the medical jargon; I'm here with the real 'hacks' to help you achieve that disciplined lifestyle. Let's get started!
